entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
